question.content: <@!745030154748821545> if there's the option to build houses or build upon plots of land, is there enough land for, say, tens of thousands of players? Are we looking at a procedurally generated world (similar to No Man's Sky), or will there be a layered system where hundreds of people can have their own plot of land, but you're only in one instance at a time (based on party, or other exclusive group feature) (like WoW's Warlords of Draenor garrisons?)

answer.content: This might be something we will look into, but I can currently say our maps will not be procedurally generated. We want the art of the game to feel very handcrafted
